name: Survive and Revenge
description:
Survive and Revenge is an action and survival game set in a post-apocalyptic world. There are different levels to explore and survive.

Loot and Craft

Resources are rare in the world and only by gathering and looting you can survive. Loot is needed to craft important items.

Explore and Fight

Fight with mutants and outlaws to discover remote places.

Quests and story

Follow the main story and decide for yourself which side quests you will complete.

Base and cities

Buy a base and have the base expanded. Settlements can be inhabited by good or bad people.
